author: Staff Reporter
text:
Cong. accuses TMC of abducting Debajyoti Roy

Five days after his disappearance, Independent Councillor of Kandi Municipality in Murshidabad Debajyoti Roy resurfaced on Sunday.

His disappearance had created a controversy as the Congress lost the confidence vote of the municipality earlier this week as Mr. Roy was unable to participate in the polling.

The Murshidbad district is considered a Congress bastion.

Speaking to journalists after his return, Mr. Roy said: “I am a Leftist worker. I did not compromise on my ideals despite pressure and lure of money from the abductors.”

Interestingly, even as the Congress accused the Trinamool Congress of “kidnapping” him, Mr. Roy did not mention Trinamool in this regard.

“I am a Leftist worker…did not compromise on my ideals despite pressure”
title: Kandi Councillor resurfaces 5 days after disappearance
